title: Mailvox: Vox’s Third Law
author: VD
content_html:
Arthur C. Clarke’s Third Law states: “Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.” I propose a law paraphrasing it thusly: “Any sufficiently advanced intelligence is indistinguishable from insanity”.

You need an IQ this high –> 115
